name: CatalystOne Solutions
description: A fast-growing SaaS company specialized in software and services for digitalizing HR processes and enabling positive relations between HR, employees, and managers. We provide user-friendly solutions for processes such as HR master data, performance management, talent management, and learning management. We work closely with our customers to ensure maximum value and provide support beyond expectations - passion for our customers’ success is in our DNA. We are a value driven company in hyper-growth working in the intersection of HR and IT looking for new co-workers in many different professional fields. Do you want to make a difference, have fun doing so and be part of our great adventure? Feel free to look at our job ads here on LinkedIn and on our career page. If there’s no vacancy suited to you right now you can always send in an open application and our roads might meet in the future.
features: Passion for People – Customers and Colleagues. We go the extra mile. We create an inspiring work environment. We take pride in everything we do. We help each other.
Flexibility and creativity. We like finding smart solutions. We change our priorities if needed. We respond fast. We are open to new ideas.
Value creation in everything we do. We help customers achieve desired outcomes. We focus on long-term goals and short-term wins. We share knowledge. We accept failure and learn from mistakes.
tags: Hire Top Talent Faster and More Efficiently
Boost Hiring Manager Confidence and Productivity
Headline: Build a thriving workplace with us!
ShortDescription: CatalystOne Solutions is a rapidly growing SaaS company with over 200 passionate employees who all work towards a common goal: enabling businesses to thrive.
enhanced_description: CatalystOne Solutions is a rapidly growing SaaS company specializing in user-friendly software and services for digitalizing core HR processes. Their comprehensive solutions enable positive relations between HR, employees, and managers, covering functionalities such as HR master data, performance management, talent management, and learning management. With a strong focus on customer success, CatalystOne aims to help businesses thrive by ensuring maximum value and providing support beyond expectations.
key_use_cases: Enabling positive relations between HR, employees, and managers
Hiring top talent faster and more efficiently
Boosting hiring manager confidence and productivity
competitive_advantages: Strong customer focus and support ('passion for customers’ success', 'support beyond expectations')
Commitment to value creation and achieving desired customer outcomes
Agility and responsiveness ('finding smart solutions', 'change priorities if needed', 'respond fast', 'open to new ideas')
roi_benefits: Digitalization of HR processes leading to increased efficiency
Enhanced employee and manager relations fostering a thriving workplace
Faster and more efficient talent acquisition
Boosted hiring manager confidence and productivity
Contribution to overall business thriving and success
